title: Generate Stylistc Sets
content:
I bought the Avant Garde Pro package at fontshop.at - this new issue of the avant garde typeface provides several stilistic sets in the character menue - now i want to apply a customer logo with TypeTool - but when i generate the font, the stilistic sets are gone.

how can i prevent that TypeTool delete the stilistic sets - anybody an idea?

alex

 [‹ How do I correctly set a series of justified, bulleted paragraphs in indesign?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071115033828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38952 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fontlab Opentype Class Kerning ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071115033828/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38773 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ag_alexgrimm

comments.content:
Alex,

when asking these sorts of questions, please give some indication what precisely you are doing: What operating system are you using? What TypeTool version? What format are you generating the font in?

A.

I have a apple G5 / Typetool 3 / I open a Opentype-font (avnat garde Pro) - make my modifikations (apply a vector-logo) - then I want to generate a Opentype-font again —-\> but in indesign, there aren’t any stilistic sets to choose - they are all in brackets. in the original font there are stilistic sets!

thanks
